overview: Four uncut camera rolls, unspooled intermittently across thirteen years. One is a portrait of a friend, another is of a particular plant, the third of one kind of family, the fourth of another kind; all of them photographed to mark a particular time or a specific event. To build a future together one must always share a bit of one's past. These rolls represent the first collection in what remains an ongoing project. - David Gatten
title: Devotions Upon Emergent Occasions
